Package remixlab.proscene

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MouseGrabbable
    Interface for objects that grab mouse focus in a Scene.
    Trackable
    Interface for objects that are to be tracked by a proscene Camera when its mode is THIRD_PERSON.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AxisPlaneConstraint
    An abstract class for Frame constraints defined by an axis or a plane.
    Bindings<K,A>
    A parameterized template class used to define shortcut bindings.
    Camera
    A perspective or orthographic camera.
    CameraConstraint
    An AxisPlaneConstraint defined in the camera coordinate system.
    CameraProfile
    This class encapsulates a set of camera keyboard shortcuts, and camera and frame mouse bindings which together represent a "camera mode".
    ClickBinding
    This class represents mouse click shortcuts.
    Constraint
    An interface class for Frame constraints.
    DesktopEvents
    This class provides low level java.awt.* based input event handling.
    Frame
    A Frame is a 3D coordinate system, represented by a Frame.position() and an Frame.orientation().
    HIDevice
    An HIDevice represents a Human Interface Device with (<=) 6 degrees of freedom.
    InteractiveAvatarFrame
    The InteractiveAvatarFrame class represents an InteractiveDrivableFrame that can be tracked by a Camera, i.e., it implements the Trackable interface.
    InteractiveCameraFrame
    The InteractiveCameraFrame class represents an InteractiveFrame with Camera specific mouse bindings.
    InteractiveDrivableFrame
    The InteractiveDrivableFrame represents an InteractiveFrame that can "fly" in the scene.
    InteractiveFrame
    A InteractiveFrame is a Frame that can be rotated and translated using the mouse.
    KeyboardShortcut
    This class represents keyboard shortcuts.
    KeyFrameInterpolator
    A keyFrame Catmull-Rom Frame interpolator.
    LocalConstraint
    An AxisPlaneConstraint defined in the Frame local coordinate system.
    MathUtils
    Utility class that complements the PVector and PMatrix classes.
    MouseGrabber
    Base class for mouse grabbers objects that implements the MouseGrabbable interface.
    Point
    Point class that provides a quick replacement for the java.awt.Point.
    Quaternion
    A 4 element unit quaternion represented by single precision floating point x,y,z,w coordinates.
    Rectangle
    Rectangle class that provides a quick replacement for the java.awt.Rectangle.
    Scene
    A 3D interactive Processing scene.
    WorldConstraint
    An AxisPlaneConstraint defined in the world coordinate system.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AxisPlaneConstraint.Type
    Type lists the different types of translation and rotation constraints that are available.
    Camera.Kind
    Enumerates the Camera kind.
    Camera.Type
    Enumerates the two possible types of Camera.
    Camera.Visibility
    Enumerates the different visibility state an object may have respect to the camera frustum.
    CameraProfile.Mode  
    HIDevice.CameraMode
    This enum holds the camera modes predefined by an HIDevice.
    HIDevice.IFrameMode
    This enum holds the interactive frame manipulation modes predefined by an HIDevice.
    HIDevice.Mode
    This enum holds the device type.
    Scene.Arrow
    Constants associated to the different arrow keys.
    Scene.Button
    Constants associated to the different mouse buttons which follow java conventions.
    Scene.CameraKeyboardAction
    Defines the different camera actions that can be associated with a specific keyboard key.
    Scene.ClickAction
    This enum defines mouse click actions to be binded to the mouse.
    Scene.KeyboardAction
    Defines the different actions that can be associated with a specific keyboard key.
    Scene.Modifier
    Constants associated to the different modifier keys which follow java conventions.
    Scene.MouseAction
    This enum defines mouse actions (click + drag) to be binded to the mouse.
